```{r}
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
airstrikes <- read_csv(here("data/DroneWarsData.csv"))
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
# airstrikes tidy
airstrikes_tidy <- as_tibble(airstrikes) |>
  mutate(Date = mdy(`Date (MM-DD-YYYY)`)) |>
  select(!c(`Date (MM-DD-YYYY)`, 5:15)) |>
  relocate(Date) |>
  select(!9:12)

airstrikes_tidy <- airstrikes_tidy[complete.cases(airstrikes_tidy[, 1:3]), ]
```
